abstract: Energy Dept approves project by Clean Line Energy Partners to bring wind energy out of Texas and Oklahoma panhandle; decision offers sign that Obama administration is still encouraging spread of renewable energy.
snippet: The decision signals that the Obama administration remains committed to encouraging the spread of renewable energy....
lead_paragraph: The decision signals that the Obama administration remains committed to encouraging the spread of renewable energy.

headline.main: Wind Power Transmission Project in Plains Earns U.S. Approval
headline.print_headline: U.S. Approves Wind Power Transmission Project
